Package org.accada.epcis.repository

Class Summary
CaptureOperationsModule CaptureOperationsModule implements the core capture operations.
EventFieldExtension A simple representation for an event field extension.
QueryInitHandler This is an Axis message chain handler which handles incoming SOAP messages before they reach the EPCIS query service (QueryOperationsModule).
QueryOperationsModule EPCIS Query Operations Module implementing the SOAP/HTTP binding of the Query Control Interface.
QueryPostHandler This is an Axis message chain handler which handles outgoing SOAP messages when they leave the EPCIS query service (QueryOperationsModule).
QuerySubscription Implements a subscription to a query.
QuerySubscriptionScheduled Special case of Subscription (from subscribe() on query interface) where the subscription is scheduled.
QuerySubscriptionTriggered Implementation of triggers.
Schedule This is a simple schedule which can return a "next scheduled time" after now or a given time.
